channel.title: My Client
channel.description:
why does my client say this?
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
and how do i fix it?
thanks
Heres the original run command:
@echo off cd files title Running 508 Client java -Xmx256m -cp . client 66 live live software members english game1 pause

@denhanhan wrote:

You ONLY had to change the java NOT the -Xmx256m -cp . client 66 live live software members english game1

This is the right code:

item.title: My Client
item.dc:creator: @master_guard1 master_guard
item.description:
@master_guard1 wrote:

then i get this:

Usage: java [-options] class [args…]
(to execute a class)
or java [-options] -jar jarfile [args…]
(to execute a jar file)

where options include:
-client to select the “client” VM
-server to select the “server” VM
-hotspot is a synonym for the “client” VM [deprecated]
The default VM is client.

-cp <class search path of directories and zip/jar files>
-classpath <class search path of directories and zip/jar files>
              A ; separated list of directories, JAR archives,
              and ZIP archives to search for class files.
-D<name>=<value>
              set a system property
-verbose[:class|gc|jni]
              enable verbose output
-version      print product version and exit
-version:<value>
              require the specified version to run
-showversion  print product version and continue
-jre-restrict-search | -jre-no-restrict-search
              include/exclude user private JREs in the version search
-? -help      print this help message
-X            print help on non-standard options
-ea[:<packagename>...|:<classname>]
-enableassertions[:<packagename>...|:<classname>]
              enable assertions
-da[:<packagename>...|:<classname>]
-disableassertions[:<packagename>...|:<classname>]
              disable assertions
-esa | -enablesystemassertions
              enable system assertions
-dsa | -disablesystemassertions
              disable system assertions
-agentlib:<libname>[=<options>]
              load native agent library <libname>, e.g. -agentlib:hprof
                see also, -agentlib:jdwp=help and -agentlib:hprof=help
-agentpath:<pathname>[=<options>]
              load native agent library by full pathname
-javaagent:<jarpath>[=<options>]
              load Java programming language agent, see java.lang.instrument

-splash:<imagepath>
              show splash screen with specified image

Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: My Client
item.dc:creator: @gnomez gnomez
item.description:
@gnomez wrote:

[quote=“master_guard, post:3, topic:386124”]Hey heres the command It was:

@echo off
cd files
title Running 508 Client
java -Xmx256m -cp . client 66 live live software members english game1
pause

I changed to this:

@echo off
cd files
title Running 508 Client
C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe
pause

AND I GET THIS:

‘C:\Program’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .

Still doesnt work[/quote]
do “C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” dont forget the little quote things

Read full topic

item.title: My Client
item.dc:creator: @master_guard1 master_guard
item.description:
@master_guard1 wrote:

Hey heres the command It was:

@echo off
cd files
title Running 508 Client
java -Xmx256m -cp . client 66 live live software members english game1
pause

I changed to this:

@echo off
cd files
title Running 508 Client
C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe
pause

AND I GET THIS:

‘C:\Program’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .

Still doesnt work

Read full topic

item.title: My Client
item.dc:creator: @denhanhan denhanhan
item.description:
@denhanhan wrote:

Its 'cause ur Path isn’t setted, just right click on your run.bat, and and replace the java with this
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe”

If you have a 64bit computer replace the java with this
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe”

Read full topic

title Running 508 Client
java -Xmx256m -cp . client 66 live live software members english game1
